ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Your thread and every other Bard thread.  I couldn t find any of the four Bard Bug compilation threads today. Kenross Cantoforjado, 51 songs, Innoruuk
ygData.messageBody:
Your thread and every other Bard thread. I couldn't find any of the four Bard Bug compilation threads
today.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 51 songs, Innoruuk


"Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" wrote:

> the BP was never the issue. it was always the arms, bracer, and helm that
> were (and are still) missing from the game. nothing was fixed. my thread
> is all but forgotten. oh well =/
>
> Shada Powa, L55 Wood Elf Troubador
> Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
> <Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
>
> > Hmmm - Bards complain publicly that certain Singing
> > Armor pieces have never
> > dropped. Lots of Bumps on the BBS. No response from Verant; but one
> > assumes they saw the Thread.
> >
> > A patch goes on the server. THEN a Singing Breatplate
> > is found on a
> > server.
> >
> > Could this be coincidence? Did they find an error in
> > the Drop Tables and
> > secretly fix it?
>
